content.detailedDescription: I was going onto shift, to begin my patrol. and was prepping my patrol vehicle, when i noticed 3 lights to the north of my building. 2 were orange and 1 was red, they slowly drifted toward the west. each had a different altitude, and although they didn't seem to be in formation they didn't change distance from one another. i observed them drift to the west against the easterly breeze for about 2 minutes.. in that time they didn't get very far.. maybe another half mile west.. i went inside quickly to retrieve the binoculars and night vision.. maybe a minute later i came back outside expecting to still see them approximately where i had last saw them as they weren't moving very fast, honestly expecting to make out chinese lanterns thru the binoculars.. but all three were gone.. from where my building is i have the highest vantage point in all of wilkes barre.. and i could not see them down the valley to the west.. they were gone.. kinda disappointed..
content.summary: 3 lights pass over wilkes barre, 2 orange, 1 red.

content.detailedDescription: My niece sam alerted me of the ufo as it came to view.Silently going at great speed across the sky.At the time i was exlplaining to her that it would be rare to see a ufo,so i got binoculars out to look at the moon being the anniversary of the moon landing.Just at that moment sam screamed out look tim and to amazement this glowing object darted across the sky.After the sighting we went back in all exited to tell my wife mary,but she thought we were kidding her.
content.summary: Glowing bright object speeding across sky.

content.detailedDescription:
This happened before 2003 , but really cant remember the date. 
we usually have power cuts in kerala,india . one day during the power-cut (around 7.30pm) i went and climbed on to the border wall of our compound, near the car shed, so that i could chat with my neighbor buddy,who came out due to the power-cut. we were having a casual talk for a long time, mosquito were biting us & suddenly both of us saw a bright light on the skies a bit towards the north, it was not as big as a moon but seemed as if it was very near than that of the moon, and was the size bigger than that of the stars,it hovered for a while and disappeared leaving trails of light giving us an idea that it moved to the east direction ,while we were watching the skies it immediately reappeared in the skies towards the east direction but not too far away,

in between my friend asked , what is this & i didn't gave any reply.Suddenly we saw it moved  towards the west direction, leaving trail for a while , and hovered for the final time & disappeared. 

both of us were stunned and were speech less, we didn't had the courage to speak it to others because of the feeling that no one would believe us. i told it my father . he seemed to be normal and didn't question much.. the chapter was closed , until i came up with some close friends who were really interested in ufos..I spoke out to them and no one els.


after 2004 for my surprise i again saw the same type of light flashing hovering & then moving ,this time direction pattern changed and my dad was also with me, it was during the summer season , we used to sleep in the top of our house for a while... as we were talking both of saw this and i told him that this was what exactly i saw years before along with my friend, and he too was confused , because we have seen meteorites ,shooting stars etc, but never such an event and the direction by which it moves the trails, its closeness to the earth etc, we could clearly say that it was not a natural event .....



i will try to draw how they  appeared to me in photoshop and upload
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Flashed hovered & moved with trails at three points with bright light & very close when compared with stars or even moon .

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in the backyard with some friends. one of them said what are those lights in the sky? we all got up to look and all saw the same lights. started with just two. moved across from the east to northeast, then stopped forward motion, one headed more north then faded away, the other stayed in one spot then faded away. another came across a little later, did the same thing. i went to grab a camera but couldn't focus on it. went to grab a different camera from my car, saw another coming on the same path.Managed to video it but couldn't zoom enough. this was the last one we saw.
content.summary: 4 or 5 lights moving in, hovering then fading away

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were driving north on m25 in the thumb are of michigan. we were heading home from a road trip. we left the city of harbor beach at approx 11pm. we looked at our mapquest, which said we should have been home in the northern detroit area in 2 hours 20 minutes. i remember we were driving and i was looking at the lake and said to my daughter that it was pretty and close. she said, what was that? i said what? she said that light over there. i said "i dunno, its probably lightning'. so i looked to the right (west) and saw a flash of light also. i thought maybe it was lightning. it was on the west side of m25, not on the lakeside. then we cleared some trees. there was a corn field about 100 acres. the light was in the middle and you could see that it was flashing also on the trees. we said, maybe its a lighthouse. but then the lights got faster, and we realized it was the wrong side of the road and in the middle of a field. seconds later the lights sped up, changed color and looked like a spinning top upside down. to me, the lights looked blurry and colorful. then the next thing we know we are at port huron. my daughter says, "that can't be port huron, its 30 minutes still, look at my map". and i did and it said we were 30 minutes away. also we got home at 12.30 ish so our total trip from harbor beach to warren mi was 1 1/2 hours, not possible. but that's the case. also we had cell phone drops when on the phone.
content.summary: Undescribed flashing lights in sky in michigan thumb area m25

content.detailedDescription: First observed coming from the southwest, following satellite path towards northwest. i had believed it was a satellite until a change in altitude drop and course change to northeast of 30 degrees. object gave off star like reflection while traveling then went dark. object reappeared further northeast and then committed a dramatic course change in altitude of about 75 degrees, causing a flame trail behind object while exiting earth���s atmosphere. about five to ten seconds later object reapers and beginnings massive bright pulse of light (beyond light reflection, the object was emitting this light pulse).  the pulse lasted for about two to three seconds. the object then disperse again and reapers another ten seconds later, once more in different location and on different course, emits the pulse of light once more then changes course to the northeast and goes dark and not seen again.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Object pulsed light

content.detailedDescription: I was inside my car driving . i got some feeling to look up ( over windshield) .First 5 second i haven't think , i was just looking at the flying object , then next 2 second i was focused to note blink my eyes , cause i knew ( for some reason idk why) if i blink the object will preform to invisible . then , when the flying object desapeared , i thought wish i flye that fast to be at my place in vegas in a few second . my feelings was - i know i saw it ! again !! ... where is the gas station ?! i'm in the middle of no where!! how many miles left until i ll see any light in this desert at night... i blink my eyes and this flying object preform to invisible otherwise where is the tail ???...
content.summary: I saw a very strange flying object under windshield over my car .

content.detailedDescription: We were outside and saw bright red yellow orange lights moving west toeast quickly faster then any other objects. followed by explosions, then military aircraft. multiple eyewitnesses with military experience were totally stumped and blown away. they were heading towards the moon and nyc.
content.summary: Bright orange red yellow lights following each other going east witnessed by multiple people

content.detailedDescription: I was going onto shift, to begin my patrol. and was prepping my patrol vehicle, when i noticed 3 lights to the north of my building. 2 were orange and 1 was red, they slowly drifted toward the west. each had a different altitude, and although they didn't seem to be in formation they didn't change distance from one another. i observed them drift to the west against the easterly breeze for about 2 minutes.. in that time they didn't get very far.. maybe another half mile west.. i went inside quickly to retrieve the binoculars and night vision.. maybe a minute later i came back outside expecting to still see them approximately where i had last saw them as they weren't moving very fast, honestly expecting to make out chinese lanterns thru the binoculars.. but all three were gone.. from where my building is i have the highest vantage point in all of wilkes barre.. and i could not see them down the valley to the west.. they were gone.. kinda disappointed..
content.summary: 3 lights pass over wilkes barre, 2 orange, 1 red.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside grilling with friends on the grill when i seen the ufo, i look up seen a rainbow and went to take a photo of the rainbow and i seen it, i cought a photo of it i have a few of all the same time stamp but only one has the ufo in it.
content.summary: I was outside grilling on the grill when i seen the ufo, i look up seen a rainbow and went to take a photo of the rainbow and i seen it, i cought a photo of it i have a few of all the same time stamp.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were out on the balcony and in the south of the sky we noticed a faint orange red like light that was floating through he sky.  we thought it was a helicopter but moved south east quicker and closer to our area.  it looked as if it was going up further into the sky/clouds.  it kept going south east and further up and then disappeared.

it kinda freaked us out as it didn't look like a plane or helicopter, and during this time our baby woke up like never before - just a screaming cry like a scarred cry.  not typical and not sure if it is just a coincidence but was weird and when the light disappeared the baby was fine.  wouldn't go back to bed but he stopped crying!
content.summary: Saw an orange red like light that fluttered through the sky

content.detailedDescription: Southeast from my house and a bright orange glow (brighter than a plane) was a couple of miles away in the sky about the size of a large aircraft. it was below clouds so it was not a star or a satellite. it was also not stationary. it glided slowly across the horizon for a good 20 minutes then just faded out of sight.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A bright orange glow a couple of miles away in the sky about the size of a large aircraft.

content.detailedDescription: Out to have a smoke. layed on my car looking at stars when i noticed this "thing" why above jets that were flying overhead. i even woke my wife to look at it. she saw it but wasn't as interested. i want to get back outside to watch it some more
content.summary: 3 lights triangle in shape was hovering

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down route 20 passing through pingree grove in illinois, around 10:45 this morning, i'm a cloud enthusiast, my eyes caught a straight white line in the sky about 2 inches long and there was something in front of it,or back, that seemed to be in the state of flux that i really couldn't make out the shape,i tried to take a picture as i was driving but could not, as i drove the to objects were still in the sky for several minutes.. i kept thinking stop and get a picture, but couldn't because construction was going on a bridge right as i was passing under i 90, on 20 going north towards the ta truck stop, as i started to pull over the object that was in front of the tube shaped (white) object pulled away then it seemed to then take form into a silver oval object, which could of been the sun reflection on the object, and took off, the other white tubular object seemed to take off the other direction north with in seconds it disappear. and all i could think of is did any of those guys working on the bridge see that.
content.summary: While driving noticed a stable tube shaped object in sky, with some thing fluttering in front of it

content.detailedDescription: Orbs observed from south side looking west. orbs rising from horizon to form large triangle staying in formation. orbs rose straight up from horizon in single formation spred out into a triangle formation. they were pulsing and traveled a while apparently ascending gradually. exactly 16 ufos appeared . they would dissappeaer in flight not to appear again. one ufo remaing motionless at the end of the event for about 3 min. began to move away into west north west going ubtill i lkost site. there are three other witnesses.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multiple triangle formations of orbs

content.detailedDescription: 2 friends and i were camping near boreas pass colorado when dylan and i(john) witnessed, around 2:30 am 2 blue,green, yellow, red. flashing/pulsating orbs miles away moving in wave and spiral patterns; which we both observed through binoculars and a 7x rifle scope for a both 30 minutes before we went to sleep.
content.summary: 2 blue,green, yellow, red. flashing/pulsating orbs miles away moving in wave and spiral patterns

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home heading west on rt 222. about a mile and a half from the rt. 281 - rt 222 intersection. 

i (& my wife) noticed a light was hovering above the tree tops. at first i thought it was a plane flying low, but the light was not moving. the object did not appear to be moving at all. the object appeared to be a hovering light above some trees. i could not determine the altitude or the size of the object. the lights were quite bright on it and were a white/yellow in color. the object did not appear to be very large. 

i drove by the object and then when i was able turned around to take a closer look. by the time that was done (maybe 30 - 45 seconds) the lights were gone.

i believe there was two other people who saw the object as there was a car stopped along side of the road and two people were looking into the sky at the direction of the light/object.
content.summary: Hovering light in sky

content.detailedDescription:
Hello i was up late last night star gazing, i was looking at a group of stars that i see almost every night. it was shaped as a small triangle with a fourth of to the lower right, the one on the lower right for no apparent reason split into two separate, stars/orbs the second star ascended upwards at a gradual pace. i have notice this happen on different occasion but this time it was connect to the lower one and kind of looked like a string or stick. it appeared to get brighter as it ascended vertically. my wife at the time was getting ready for work so i ran to get her when we returned it was just a single star, i maid a comment jokingly about great its going to make me look like a fool. so i began to describe it to her, as i was doing so it started to do it again, it was by far the brightest thing in the sky at the time, it keeped doing this at a constant pace ascended into a straight line of light then descended back into a single point, it repeated this behavior for at least 30 minutes. it could of went on much longer not sure i ended up going to bed, im not sure but there were defanently two orbs it was hard to tell because it was very bright when it would begin to ascend, im not sure if it was a straight line of light or several orbs emerging from each other in a straight line, it was very high and from were i was it appeared to be a dote that would change into a line roughly or several dotes in close proximaty about 2 to 4 inches in length also as it ascended it got brighter and appear to get wider. i am extremely fascinated by this and would love to hear some feed back if you have any.

thanks rick
content.summary: Saw what apeared to be a star then a second one emerged acende straight up then looked like a vertical line of light then decended back to original point

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my gramma were driving at night..Looked towards sky
saw a glowing object  hovering over trees.  looked like a star
but it then glowed brighter and very very slowing seemed to be
moving in a straight path over the trees..Could no longer 
take a picture it was cloudy and very dark then disappeared.
   i knew it wasnt a star it seemed brighter and bigger. even
my gramma thought it was unusual that it actually moved and
disappeared over treetops..
content.summary: Glowing object hovered over trees looked like star

content.detailedDescription: Figured it important to tell someone about strange object(s) that pasted directly overhead ..Over middle of our town of ottawa, ohio on june 8th 2010 approximately 9:00. just before the sun had set.      i believe it would help in some way in order to understand  which is why i sending this email. i have no idea if you are even the right people to contact.   after four days and then last night having someone else confirm to my wife and i that atleast three more people witnessed the same things.... i thought it important to explain to someone who may be able to tell us what this was.  these people we know who live at least one mile away in glandorf, ohio saw the same object pass over their property.  same descriptions ...Moving slowly , amber colored lighting at some point and dark circular object directly overhead, and is not making any sound.  conditions weather wise were extremely calm and clear, no way of wind guiding its path or speed.  my wife and i both saw at least two of the same things at our home. i have additional information and rendering of what i saw, just too much to include with this message.   i would ask that this email and my name be held extremely in confidence.  i am looking for possible explainations, not attention.  my thinking is that it is absolutely impossible that more people could not have witnessed this..... people within the communities of ottawa and glandorf had to have seen this because of how obvious these objects where directly above the communities.
content.summary: Viewed 3 objects over residence in ottawa, ohio

but it then glowed brighter and very very slowing seemed to be

   i knew it wasnt a star it seemed brighter and bigger. even
my gramma thought it was unusual that it actually moved and

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to take pictures, was outside for about 30 minutes prior to event, had urge to start taking pictures to the left .  noted multiple orbs some bright white in nature.  large shadow looking object noted between the clothing lines that was over my head.  it seem to just over there.  did not hear anything.  dark in nature with small white lights outside.  i just took some pictures.
content.summary: Multiple orbs bright and one large craft looking object noted

content.detailedDescription: Me and my mom were driving home from scouts near the saint phillips inn area, we turned onto the road that takes us home and opened the sun roof, because it was warm.  i pointed out something in the sky to my mom that appeared stealth bomber shaped. she looked. it was also going quite slow, slow enough not to be a plane.  it was shaped like a triangle but with a little triangle cut out of the back. it also had orange and blue pulsating lights. we continued to drive looking at it. it was dark but we could see the outline of whatever it was by the lights aforementioned on it. it made no evident noise. we were tired from a long day and did not desire to pursue it. we were driving west along the road as it was going in a straight line north east. we stopped for a second and watched as it disappeared over the tree line.  we were generally shocked. i tried to get my ipod out to tape it. it did not get any good tape of it. we continued on home and that's it. the closest big city was evansville but the closest city was mount vernon .
content.summary: It was a black surfaced triangular object. it had a blue light that pulse slowly and an orange light that pulsed faster than the blue light

content.detailedDescription: Playing baseball in the dark at matheson park. 4 of us in the group. i noticed the object and told my friend that it looked unusual. other people with us said it might be a balloon. one said it could be an airplane but i pointed out that the light is the wrong color. someone mentioned that it could be a comet, but the object was much too close. someone mentioned the possibility of a helicopter, but the light from the object was bright, steady, and orange, and was only interrupted by clouds. the skies were cloudy and a bit stormy, so a manned ballon also would not be practical. the object was glowing orange and in and out of the clouds. it hovered, moved toward us, all at about 40 degrees elevation to the south. it then descended for a few seconds and moved slightly left and right. after about 5 minutes, it receded quickly (my guess is 250 knots plus) to the west and faded out of view in the clouds. it was difficult to determine the shape of the object, as the light emitted was so bright, however one person in my party suggested that it was shaped like a "tall soup can." we wondered how many other people saw the object, being over such a populated area. we were disappointed that none of us had our cellphones with us so at to take photos.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Object emitted orange glow, remained stationary, then descending somewhat, then receded at a high speed

content.detailedDescription:
Left saturday at 4am for east pa to test an alternative health invention on willing recipient, se of harrisburg route 72. great perfect session had dinner and headed back on rt322/22 to converg with i80. nearly at i80 when dr. pete calls with big hardware problems so we needed to divert and find a meeting spot which ended up at exit 48 on 76 in pittsburgh. turning into a long trip and nearly 2am when finally met up at the exit 48 macdonalds.
we had a perfect but long session, caring some cyrstals for advanced research and our electronics. first strangeness was at the 322 and route 15 i was hit with this blankness on the left and extrem need to turn to the right once going north but easterly toward i80 frank points out the gps map and we turn around back to the 322 westarly but just before 2 strange men with black glasses and short hair maybe older types in a completely restored 62 dodge van very slowly passed us and looking constantly at us like we were an attraction. a 62 dodge painted blue and white stands out. then we are on i80 and i open my mouth by saying all we needed was to have a cloud ship reveel itself to us! well dr. pete insists on meeting and we divert through dubois south rt 119. while in town the blankness makes me suddenly turn right into a blacked out part of town but we noticed the gps wrong area and went around the block to return to the correct intersection and south 119. a very dark and curvy rout with 55mph signs right next to 35mph signs with curves that were much slower with hills and dale wow.. out in the middle of the country with no lights other than that guy who was following much of the time with brights on so i flipped the mirror but the on comming traffic kept their brights on so it was a difficult stress full to see section. the third blankness turn to the right was at maybe 536 / 36 136? east west with no forward road orther than blackness... it was impearitive that i stear right. the intersection was litup with rolled berms that were painted with the florescent white in a stripped pattern so i went right but this time stopped on the right ramps right berm and remember putting the car in park. it seemed only a couple of minutes frank the other inventor checking the gps and dr. pete is on the phone wondering where are we? strange how the lights were still behind us and they did not pass.... then.... we think the memory wipe reset / video made and the lights dissappeared happened here. we just seemed to anwser the phone check the gps and went around the intersection to the south and onward. i worry about the video because the audio sounds like a train which there were 3 trains at the macdonalds  at x48... although to have been taken there you would have seen myself , dr pete, the 2cars, 5 lanes of traffic and the area was well lit up.At 2am many people came to the drive through  passed by us and looked directly at us toward the the trains?? acouple was making out under the lights next to their car but on the side away from us as well as a person had acar hauling truck come by to service there car. the blankness is like what you see after a camera flash in the face.... nothing! always above and to the left and impossible not to react to. hope you can anaylze the video, trying to send it to john. ... ok i will need to do a follow up on this page as soon as i can find the video again, gees
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 blankness like light to force turning right, blanken memory, left video

content.detailedDescription:
At that time (+5:30 gmt ,time approximate-7 pm) we are walking in our home roof .Before some time weather condition very clear, suddenly weather change as it reflect yellow light by any object that time i take a picture by tablet and feel about it.

by suddenly changing the weather condition by an object.

i think about it as ufo.

it move to east to north direction very fast with back weather changes and effects by dark yellow light.
content.summary: At that time weather is affected by dark yellow shining .

content.detailedDescription: It has been in the fort bend area for about a year..
content.summary: It stays right around here. it never ever leaves.

content.detailedDescription: I was on break at work it was a very hot and humid night so i went outside to get some air. something caught my eye almost directly above where i was standing so i looked up at it. the object was stationary for a few seconds the abruptly started moving very fast. covering half the sky in seconds. then it stopped and got brighter then dimmed then bright again. i turned to look over the building and nearly fainted when i saw the other smaller lights. it was as if the other lights were waiting. then the lights got in a somewhat formation and in the blink of an eye shot off into the clouds! have 20 second video of it but i was too frightened to continue recording
content.summary: Bright light appeared out of nowhere then started moving fast and met up with 10-15 more pulsating objects

content.detailedDescription:
I currently work for a contracted navy parts base outside parkville, mo. an employee came pulling up at my guard shack and pointed them frantically to me saying look at those lights over there.
i looked and to my astonishment there were prolly 15+ glowing redish-orange orbs in the sky northwest over the wooded area of parkville it seemed. i would guess to say they were a few miles away from the english landing park that direction. i sat there and watched the lights come up from the horizon at nighttime. at first i assumed it was flares but as the lights all came up 1 after another in sequence order it seemed strange. then when they were up in the sky they started moving and making a triangle formation. the triangle stayed that way for a good 45 minutes just sitting there and then just ended. 10 minutes later it happened again as i stated above and lasted until about 9pm cst. 
directly after the lights stopped around 9 pm 4 black helicopters came over parkville/riverside where i work at a very very low altitude. i would say they were prolly 150 ft in the air, enought to where i could see the latchs on the side of the doors on the helicopters at night time. no lights wre on, on any of the helicopters and they were all moving at a amazingly fast pace.

i did not see anything more after the helicopters and i can only think of what happened.
content.summary: Redish orange lights forming a triangle shape
